original_text:
For the Lord has given the command,
    and he will smash the great house into pieces
    and the small house into bits.
korean_text: 보라 여호와께서 명령하시므로 타격을 받아 큰 집은 갈라지고 작은 집은 터지리라

sentences.original_text: For the Lord has given the command
and he will smash the great house into pieces
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 큰 집을 부수어 조각을 내며

sentences.original_text: and the small house into bits.
